oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Cpl. Ernest P. West, Batry. B, 114th F.A. Regt., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Cpl. Ernest P. West, Batry. B. 114th F.A., 30th Div., was a native of Chattanooga and his unit had previous service as Batry. B, 1st Tenn. Art. in the Tennessee National Guard. He served overseas from May 26 to January 19, 1918. In this photograph he stands in his shirt sleeves just inside an open tent and holds a small puppy. The photograph is part of a larger collection owned by Cpl. West. This photograph was probably taken at Camp Sevier, S.C.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: West, Ernest P.
